an10.61:1.1: “Bhikkhus, this is said: ‘No first point of ignorance is evident, before which there was no ignorance, and afterwards it came to be.’
an10.61:1.2: Still, it is evident that ‘ignorance depends on this.’
an10.61:2.1: I say that ignorance has its nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.61:2.2: And what is the nutriment for ignorance?
an10.61:2.4: I say that the five hindrances have their nutriment, they’re not without nutriment.
an10.61:2.5: And what is the nutriment for the five hindrances?
an10.61:2.6: You should say: ‘The three kinds of misconduct.’
an10.61:2.7: I say that the three kinds of misconduct have their nutriment, they’re not without nutriment.
an10.61:2.8: And what is the nutriment for the three kinds of misconduct?
an10.61:2.9: You should say: ‘Lack of sense restraint.’
an10.61:2.10: I say that lack of sense restraint has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.61:2.11: And what is the nutriment for lack of sense restraint?
an10.61:2.12: You should say: ‘Lack of recollection and awareness.’
an10.61:2.13: I say that lack of recollection and awareness has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.61:2.14: And what is the nutriment for lack of recollection and awareness?
an10.61:2.16: I say that not-through-the-origin attention has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.61:2.17: And what is the nutriment for not-through-the-origin attention?
an10.61:2.19: I say that lack of faith has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.61:2.20: And what is the nutriment for lack of faith?
an10.61:2.21: You should say: ‘Not listening to the true teaching.’
an10.61:2.22: I say that not listening to the true teaching has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.61:2.23: And what is the nutriment for not listening to the true teaching?
an10.61:2.24: You should say: ‘Associating with untrue persons.’
an10.61:3.1: In this way, when the factor of associating with untrue persons is fulfilled, it fulfills the factor of not listening to the true teaching. When the factor of not listening to the true teaching is fulfilled, it fulfills the factor of lack of faith … not-through-the-origin attention … lack of recollection and  awareness … lack of sense restraint …the three kinds of misconduct … the five hindrances. When the five hindrances are fulfilled, they fulfill ignorance.
an10.61:3.2: That’s the nutriment for ignorance, and that’s how it’s fulfilled.
an10.61:4.1: It’s like when the rain pours down on a mountain top, and the water flows downhill to fill the hollows, crevices, and creeks. As they become full, they fill up the pools. The pools fill up the lakes, the lakes fill up the streams, and the streams fill up the rivers. And as the rivers become full, they fill up the ocean.
an10.61:4.2: That’s the nutriment for the ocean, and that’s how it’s filled up.
an10.61:5.1:
In the same way, when the factor of associating with untrue persons is 
fulfilled, it fulfills the factor of not listening to the true teaching.
 When the factor of not listening to the true teaching is fulfilled, it 
fulfills the factor of lack of faith … not-through-the-origin attention …
 lack of recollection and  awareness … lack of sense restraint …the 
three kinds of misconduct … the five hindrances. When the five 
hindrances are fulfilled, they fulfill ignorance.
an10.61:5.2: That’s the nutriment for ignorance, and that’s how it’s fulfilled.
an10.61:6.1: I say that knowledge and liberation have their nutriment, they’re not without nutriment.
an10.61:6.2: And what is the nutriment for knowledge and liberation?
an10.61:6.3: You should say: ‘The seven awakening factors.’
an10.61:6.4: I say that the seven awakening factors have their nutriment, they’re not without nutriment.
an10.61:6.5: And what is the nutriment for the seven awakening factors?
an10.61:6.6: You should say: ‘The four foundations of recollection.’
an10.61:6.7: I say that the four foundations of recollection have their nutriment, they’re not without nutriment.
an10.61:6.8: And what is the nutriment for the four foundations of recollection?
an10.61:6.9: You should say: ‘The three kinds of good conduct.’
an10.61:6.10: I say that the three kinds of good conduct have their nutriment, they’re not without nutriment.
an10.61:6.11: And what is the nutriment for the three kinds of good conduct?
an10.61:6.13: I say that sense restraint has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.61:6.14: And what is the nutriment for sense restraint?
an10.61:6.16: I say that recollection-and-awareness has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.61:6.17: And what is the nutriment for recollection-and-awareness?
an10.61:6.19: I say that through-the-origin attention has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.61:6.20: And what is the nutriment for through-the-origin attention?
an10.61:6.22: I say that faith has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.61:6.23: And what is the nutriment for faith?
an10.61:6.24: You should say: ‘Listening to the true teaching.’
an10.61:6.25: I say that listening to the true teaching has it’s nutriment, it’s not without nutriment.
an10.61:6.26: And what is the nutriment for listening to the true teaching?
an10.61:6.27: You should say: ‘Associating with true persons.’
an10.61:7.1: In this way, when the factor of associating with true persons is fulfilled, it fulfills the factor of listening to the true teaching. When the factor of listening to the true teaching is fulfilled, it fulfills the factor of faith … through-the-origin attention … recollection-and-awareness… sense restraint …the three kinds of good conduct … the four foundations of recollection … the seven awakening factors. When the seven awakening factors are fulfilled, they fulfill knowledge and freedom.
an10.61:7.2: That’s the nutriment for knowledge and freedom, and that’s how it’s fulfilled.
an10.61:8.1: It’s like when it rains heavily on a mountain top, and the water flows downhill to fill the hollows, crevices, and creeks. As they become full, they fill up the pools. The pools fill up the lakes, the lakes fill up the streams, and the streams fill up the rivers. And as the rivers become full, they fill up the ocean.
an10.61:8.2: That’s the nutriment for the ocean, and that’s how it’s filled up.
an10.61:9.1: In the same way, when the factor of associating with true persons is fulfilled, it fulfills the factor of listening to the true teaching. When the factor of listening to the true teaching is fulfilled, it fulfills the factor of faith … through-the-origin attention … recollection-and-awareness … sense restraint …the three kinds of good conduct … the four foundations of recollection … the seven awakening factors. When the seven awakening factors are fulfilled, they fulfill knowledge and freedom.
an10.61:9.2: That’s the nutriment for knowledge and liberation, and that’s how it’s fulfilled.”
